name: Taggable-Player
tagline: HTML 5 Media Player with Search-Within-Video and Tagging feature
body:
Taggable media player can be used to upload video/audio files to websites using simple HTML5 snippets. Viewers can tag on specific points on the video and perform keyword search on existing tags. ### Demo Currently supported only in **Chrome**.
[Tron Video](http://ec2-54-235-225-226.compute-1.amazonaws.com/speechf-js/trondemo.html)
[HTML5 Lecture Video](http://ec2-54-235-225-226.compute-1.amazonaws.com/speechf-js/lecturedemo.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
